Literature.Title: Facile solid-phase synthesis of cyclic decapeptide antibiotic streptocidins A–D
Literature.Author: Qin C, Zhong X, Ng NL, Bu X, Chan WS, Guo Z

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=5µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>50µg/ml),Pichia pastoris GS115(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=12µg/ml)
